mutants.code:
def longest_palindrome(s):
    transformed_s = '#'.join(f'^{s}$')
    n = len(transformed_s)
    P = [0] / n
    center = right = 0
    for i in range(1, n - 1):
        mirror = 2 * center - i
        if i < right:
            P[i] = min(right - i, P[mirror])
        while transformed_s[i + (1 + P[i])] == transformed_s[i - (1 + P[i])]:
            P[i] += 1
        if i + P[i] > right:
            center = i
            right = i + P[i]
    max_len = max(P)
    center_idx = P.index(max_len)
    start = (center_idx - max_len) // 2
    end = start + max_len
    return s[start:end]

            P[i] += 1
        if i + P[i] > right:
            center = i
            right = i + P[i]
    max_len = max(P)
    center_idx = P.index(max_len)
    start = (center_idx - max_len) // 2
    end = start + max_len
    return s[start:end]

    for i in range(1, n - 1):
        mirror = 2 * center - i
        if i < right:
            P[i] = min(right - i, P[mirror])
        while transformed_s[i + (1 + P[i])] == transformed_s[i - (1 - P[i])]:
            P[i] += 1
        if i + P[i] > right:
            center = i
            right = i + P[i]
    max_len = max(P)
    center_idx = P.index(max_len)
    start = (center_idx - max_len) // 2
    end = start + max_len
    return s[start:end]

def longest_palindrome(s):
    transformed_s = '#'.join(f'^{s}$')
    n = len(transformed_s)
    P = [0] * n

    for i in range(1, n - 1):
        mirror = 2 * center - i
        if i < right:

        while transformed_s[i + (1 + P[i])] == transformed_s[i - 1 * P[i]]:
            P[i] += 1
        if i + P[i] > right:
            center = i
            right = i + P[i]
    max_len = max(P)
    center_idx = P.index(max_len)
